hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.paroleeligibility.report.ParoleEligibilitySummary( eligibility.id, eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate, appearanceCategory.name, status.category, status.date, eligibility.reviewDate, reason.name ) from omis.paroleeligibility.domain.ParoleEligibility as eligibility left join eligibility.appearanceCategory as appearanceCategory left join eligibility.status as status left join status.reason as reason where eligibility.offender = :offender order by eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate desc

select new omis.paroleeligibility.report.ParoleEligibilitySummary( eligibility.id, (select hearingAnalysis.id from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis inner join hearingAnalysis.eligibility eligibility2 where eligibility2 = eligibility), boardHearing.id, eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate, appearanceCategory.name, status.category, status.date, eligibility.reviewDate, reason.name, name.lastName, name.firstName, name.middleName, offender.offenderNumber, (select hearingAnalysis2.expectedCompletionDate from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis2 inner join hearingAnalysis2.eligibility eligibility3 where eligibility3 = eligibility), (select organization.name from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis3 inner join hearingAnalysis3.eligibility eligibility4 inner join hearingAnalysis3.paroleBoardItinerary paroleBoardItinerary inner join paroleBoardItinerary.paroleBoardLocation paroleBoardLocation inner join paroleBoardLocation.location location inner join location.organization organization where eligibility4 = eligibility), boardHearing.hearingDate ) from omis.boardhearing.domain.BoardHearing as boardHearing right outer join boardHearing.paroleEligibility as eligibility left join eligibility.appearanceCategory as appearanceCategory inner join eligibility.status as status left join status.reason as reason inner join eligibility.offender offender inner join offender.name name where boardHearing not in (select boardHearingDecision.hearing from omis.boardhearingdecision.domain.BoardHearingDecision boardHearingDecision where boardHearingDecision.hearing = boardHearing) and status.category not in ('WAIVED', 'INELIGIBLE') order by eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate desc

select new omis.paroleeligibility.report.ParoleEligibilitySummary( eligibility.id, (select hearingAnalysis.id from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis inner join hearingAnalysis.eligibility eligibility2 where eligibility2 = :paroleEligibility), boardHearing.id, eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate, appearanceCategory.name, status.category, status.date, eligibility.reviewDate, reason.name, name.lastName, name.firstName, name.middleName, offender.offenderNumber, (select hearingAnalysis2.expectedCompletionDate from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis2 inner join hearingAnalysis2.eligibility eligibility3 where eligibility3 = :paroleEligibility), (select organization.name from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis3 inner join hearingAnalysis3.eligibility eligibility4 inner join hearingAnalysis3.paroleBoardItinerary paroleBoardItinerary inner join paroleBoardItinerary.paroleBoardLocation paroleBoardLocation inner join paroleBoardLocation.location location inner join location.organization organization where eligibility4 = :paroleEligibility), boardHearing.hearingDate ) from omis.boardhearing.domain.BoardHearing as boardHearing right outer join boardHearing.paroleEligibility as eligibility left join eligibility.appearanceCategory as appearanceCategory inner join eligibility.status as status left join status.reason as reason inner join eligibility.offender offender inner join offender.name name where eligibility = :paroleEligibility
